title: Services
field_body: As integrative counsellors we offer different approaches depending on specific client need, and are fully trained in person-centred (humanism), cognitive behavioural therapy and psychodynamic approaches. We hope to provide you with a secure, confidential and non-judgmental space, where you can make sense of why you are feeling the way you do, and develop more awareness of your experiences. Coming for counselling can be a big decision for you, but we hope that our counsellors will be able to journey with you and help you to bring about positive change and growth as you move forward. We are very passionate about our therapeutic work, and continue to attend training and be updated on new therapeutic interventions, so that we can provide you with a highly professional and ethical service in the north coast area.
field_introduction: At Castle Counselling Services we are offering a comprehensive and professional integrative counselling service. We are located in Ballycastle, which is a central location in the North Coast Area. We are both fully qualified counsellors with experience of working in primary health care settings. We can offer you a safe space to consider your issues, and you will be assured of a professional, confidential and ethical approach in our therapeutic work.

title: Therapists
field_body: Counselling services in the North Coast Causeway area of Northern Ireland, we can offer you an initial telephone consultation for 15/20 minutes free of charge for you to discuss the reason you are seeking counselling.

title: What We Offer
field_body: Counselling services in the North Coast Causeway area of Northern Ireland, we can offer you an initial telephone consultation for 15/20 minutes free of charge for you to discuss the reason you are seeking counselling.

title: Costs
field_introduction:
We offer counselling services in the North Coast Causeway area of Northern Ireland, we can offer you an initial telephone consultation for 15/20 minutes free of charge for you to discuss the reason you are seeking counselling.

After that we will arrange a one-to-one session. If you choose Face-to-Face then you will come into our Ballycastle office to begin your counselling.

title: Get in Touch
field_introduction: Castle Counselling Services are located at The Loft, 45 Ann Street, Ballycastle. We offer all our Face-to-Face counselling services from our private room within The Loft. Click here to get directions to Castle Counselling Services.

title: Homepage
field_additionalInformation:
At Castle Counselling services we offer you a space to talk about your issues and to focus on yourself and also to develop awareness of your experiences and assist you in making sense of why you feel they way you do.

This safe and secure space with our service will give you the opportunity to work with a qualified therapist who will offer you a confidential, secure, non-judgemental therapeutic relationship which will assist you in working through your issues to bring about possible change.
field_body: We offer a comprehensive integrative counselling service to the local north coast area. We are integrative counsellors and practice using a number of disciplines including person-centered/humanism, cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT) and psychodynamic therapy. We offer you a safe and secure place to focus on yourself, and assist you in making sense of why you are feeling the way you do.
field_introduction: Counselling services in the North Coast Causeway area of Northern Ireland, we can offer you an initial telephone consultation for 15/20 minutes free of charge for you to discuss the reason you are seeking counselling.
